title: Card 2: Innate Abilities
text:
- (H) Innate Abilities are always in effect, and thus require no additional resource expenditure from the Hero.

- (I) Combat Manoeuvres can be executed when      symbols are rolled with the attack dice. Rakkir has a Viper Strike Combat Manoeuvre that requires (2     ) to execute. Damage from a Basic Attack is always inflicted before any Combat Manoeuvre is applied.
